title: Conservation of Energy
text: Remember that energy must be conserved in our system. Also remember that the problem states the surface is frictionless.

title: Conservation of Energy
text: There is no inital potential energy thus the equation we need to solve is the Kinetic Energy Inital $$=$$ Kinetic Energy Final $$+Potential$$ Energy Final.

title: Solve
text: Solve for Vf where Vf is the final velocity: $$\frac{1}{2} 2^2$$ $$=$$ (1/2)*(Vf**2)+ $$9.8\times0.18$$.
